title: Dan Greenawalt (Forza)
description: This week Dan Greenawalt creative director of Turn 10 Studios joins us to dig into the deep details of Forza 5. We get super in depth about physics modeling, specular lighting and particle effects among other things. We also talk about E3, the XBox One, McLaren P1, McLaren 12c, Porsche 918 and Dan's M3 project.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week Dan Greenawalt creative director of Turn 10 Studios joins us to dig into the deep details of Forza 5.
